subject: Hockey, Ice
Prices (Fares, Fees and Rates)
lead_paragraph: The Dallas Stars said that they would be the first N.H.L. franchise to offer a flexible pricing plan that goes beyond the notion of charging more for games against better opponents.
snippet: The Dallas Stars said that they would be the first N.H.L. franchise to offer a flexible pricing plan that goes beyond the notion of charging more for games against better opponents.
